name: AdMobMediationAdapterVpadn
summary: This adapter enables mediation of Vpon ads via the Google Ads SDK.
description:
By default mediation adapters are not included in AdMob SDK. Each mediation network other than AdMob requries additional library component. This is Vpadn mediation adapter library, provided by Vpon.

SDK Document: http://vpon-sdk.github.io/ios/
